name: Luma Link
description:
Move your sphere to the portal. Its that easy. Or is it!?

Slide platforms with matching Lumas to create a path for your sphere to reach the portal. Tap to move your sphere onto adjacent platforms. Deliver your sphere to the portal.

So simple to learn, so difficult to master!

• 400+ FREE puzzles ranging from easy to challenging that will relax or stretch your mind
• Hundreds of additional puzzles available for purchase
• Puzzles played on grids ranging from 5x5 to 10x10
• Progress on your schedule without the pressure of time
• Challenge yourself to perfecting each puzzle in the minimum number of moves

Buy any level pack for hours of additional puzzle content without ads!
